content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to up-to-date information on the political climate and public opinion in Ireland. However, immigration has been a topic of debate in previous Irish elections and it is possible that it could be a significant issue in the upcoming elections. It's important to note that other issues, such as the economy, healthcare, housing, and climate change, may also play a significant role in the upcoming elections. Ultimately, the priorities of individual voters and the political parties' agendas will determine which issues take center stage during campaigning and the elections.
